name: Micro Dungeon
description:
You Have the Role Of An Adventurer!


In this game you have a limited number of actions. By spending them, you must try to become stronger and not die!

Main game features:


  • Random floor generation
  • Ability to select (disable/enable) enemies
  • Each hero and enemy has its own unique passive abilities
  • Different difficulty levels
  • Depending on the difficulty level, the intelligence of enemies also changes
  • Lots of different items

It is very important to build tactics for each enemy! After all, you know in advance how many action points he has and you can roughly understand where he will move. Force your enemies to play by your rules!

If you miss, the enemy will open the chest and take your loot instead of you!

Not all items are equally useful. However, you won’t know until you pick it up, right?

We have prepared interesting locations for you in which you will have to work hard to emerge victorious!
